bike.description: Hemi A1 Premium Aluminum 6061-T6, TIG welded, 2pc Monocoque TT w/ internal brake cable routing tube, cold forged drop-out w/ integrated chain tensioner system

components.description: 100% Cr-Mo, 1-1/8" CNC'd 1pc steer tube, butted 1-1/4" blades, 6mm drop-outs
SX-1, 1-1/8" threadless, Cr-Mo cups
Specialized "Asym" race stem, forged alloy, front-load, 55mm reach
100% Cr-Mo 2-piece, 195mm rise, 640mm width, 10 degree backsweep x 4 degree upsweep
Specialized Kraton, flanged dual compound, 130mm
Shimano BR-M420-L, cold forged "V" brake with stainless hardware & pipe
Shimano Deore, cold forged (right only)
ACS Claw, 1/2x3/32"x 16t
KMC Z610HX, 1/2x3/32" w/ anti-drop inner links
Truvativ, "Race Team" 180mm, forged AL-7050-TV alloy, ISIS, 5-arm 110mm bolt circle diameter
44t 7075 CNC cut alloy
Truvativ Hussefelt, ISIS spline, 68mm shell, 113mm spindle, sealed cartridge bearing
Specialized magnesium platform, 9/16" Cr-Mo axle, sealed cartridge bearing, removable screw-in pins
Rhyno Lite XL-TCB, 20 x 1.75", 36h, welded seam, double wall, CNC'd braking surface, eyelets
Specialized, 36 hole for aero spoke, sealed cartridge bearing, machined alloy dust caps, 3/8" Cr-Mo axle
Specialized "Flip-Flop" M30/1.37" F/W threads, 36 hole for aero spoke, 3/8" Cr-Mo axle, sealed cartridge bearing
2.0mm (14g) stainless steel aero blade, brass nipples, L188/R188mm front, L186/R186mm rear
Specialized AA-Main, 20" x 2.125"
Specialized AA-Main, 20" x 1.75"
Specialized light, schraeder
Specialized racing with hollow Cr-Mo 7mm rails
Specialized alloy micro adjust, 30.9mm/300mm, for 7mm rails
Specialized forged and CNC'd single bolt design, 35/33mm
Chain guard cover, reflectors, owners manual
